abstract.para: This guide provides basic instructions on how to use SystemTap to monitor different subsystems of &PRODUCT; in finer detail. The SystemTap Beginners Guide is recommended for users who have taken RHCT or have a similar level of expertise in &PRODUCT;.

This guide provides basic instructions on how to use SystemTap to monitor different subsystems of Fedora in finer detail. The SystemTap Beginners Guide is recommended for users who have taken RHCT or have a similar level of expertise in Fedora.
